short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple email validator that checks email format and domain existence (IDN support)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Email Validator is a versatile tool that checks the validity of email addresses by verifying their format, domain existence, and registration status. In addition to these features, the tool allows users to create their own custom list of blocked emails. This ensures that any unwanted or blacklisted email addresses are automatically flagged, enhancing security and control over email interactions. Supporting Internationalized Domain Names (IDNs), Email Validator is perfect for global use, making it an essential tool for email validation, contact management, and blocking unwanted emails.
